participant_1.name: Alice
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and curious, always eager to learn new things.
participant_1.background: i have a weakness for vanilla ice cream. my favorite season is winter. i have a hat collection of over 1000 hats. i love cats and have two cats. i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and friendly, enjoys engaging with others and sharing experiences.
participant_2.background: i am a bee farmer. i have zero family that i'm close to. my name is george. my favorite food is papaya.
